alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 1:17PM CST until February 17 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wind driven snow expected through early evening. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, highest in southeastern Lee and southern De Kalb counties. North winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Lee and De Kalb Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
